welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Larbert, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Larbert."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly built terminal for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Glasgow International Airport is used for overflow flights and serves as a hub for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport with unlimited usage.
